# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x3EF515C17226Be6123DE233C5b282D4183d8c319`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0xcb8dd1d625c22c7f2572021a394c3ba3e92c732db8443a824ec214a1ac9bbdbc",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x2a1a4d1aeef14f3f95f8ef9a690e6dc04db17a82befb8ecd3a42c37266d03e36",
        "r": "0xbc6c82a52985fc29a80cefba439d17def0eac568ac3099fd94c8912556ad021d",
        "v": 27
      }
    },
    "operator": {
      "hash": "0x8f93ebd3a4529e11fbff091fdd26d5d74ecb630b8ddecc52bff119190b292f16",
      "signature": {

        "r": "0x23eb452c7ebe27d544d51fc3fdc06ea409987646c25300df694e492ecd30d778",
```

### Step 2
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementByPayment* ([0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2](https://etherscan.io/address/0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2))

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args

### Step 3
#### Contract

#### Method name
*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
